Uses of Interface
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.DatacenterCharacteristics

  • Packages that use DatacenterCharacteristics 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers
    The package provides DatacenterBroker classes that act on behalf of a cloud customer, attending his/her requests for creation and destruction of Cloudlets) and VMs, assigning such Cloudlets to specific VMs.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters
    The package provides Datacenter implementations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.network  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.power  

    • Uses of DatacenterCharacteristics in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers

      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers that return types with arguments of type DatacenterCharacteristics 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Map<Integer,DatacenterCharacteristics> DatacenterBrokerAbstract.getDatacenterCharacteristicsMap()
      Gets the datacenter characteristics map where each key is a datacenter id and each value is its characteristics object.

    • Uses of DatacenterCharacteristics in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters

      Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters that implement DatacenterCharacteristics 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DatacenterCharacteristicsSimple
      Represents static properties of a Datacenter such as architecture, Operating System (OS), management policy (time- or space-shared), cost and time zone at which the resource is located along resource configuration.
      Fields in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters declared as DatacenterCharacteristics 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DatacenterCharacteristics DatacenterCharacteristics.NULL
      A property that implements the Null Object Design Pattern for Datacenter objects.
